Description:
Detects specific patterns found after a successful ProxyLogon exploitation in relation to a Commandlet invocation of Set-OabVirtualDirectory

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: ProxyLogon MSExchange OabVirtualDirectory
Query: sourcetype='windows-msexchange-management' eql select * from _source_ where (( = 'oabvirtualdirectory' and  = ' -externalurl ') and Query('eval(request OR http://f/<script OR "unsafe"}; OR function Page_Load()'))
